data.message: hi facebook .. can you help .. i want to recover my 1acct. i dont know how .. the mobile number that i use was remove .. then i cant open it :( help me facebook thank you. n

replies.message: Hey Mckeinly. You can learn how to recover an old account you can't log into here: http://bit.ly/2bCeFAH. Please keep in mind that it's against our Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. Thanks! -Jessica

Facebook I was forced to start an additional personal account and want to join the accounts as a single account. How can it be done ? Also-why don't you answer phone calls anymore, I called you and was given a quick recording of how to contact you on the computer access. Jessica you  say it's against Facebooks "Community Standards" to maintain more than one personal account-if that's true why are you unwiilling to help me with the accounts of mine and make them a single account ?
Hey, Barry. We don't currently offer a way to merge two accounts. For more information, visit: http://bit.ly/2bpQali. -Monica
Facebook can you transfer friends from one of them to the other ?
Facebook any important pages needed just copy like comment from the acct you are now using, and they'll be saved!
Salaam mualakium thank you form Facebook
